channel.title: US Federal Government Request For Comments
channel.description: This pulls from a search of the Federal Register to pull requests for comments and make them readable.

item.title: Notice of Public Meetings and Request for Comment on the Modernization of Pilot Schools
item.description:
The Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) is soliciting feedback regarding the modernization of pilot school regulations. The objective of the modernization is to enhance safety standards, adapt to evolving technology, and create a robust training environment to reduce general aviation fatal accidents. COMMENTS_DUE: 30 May 2025

More info at: https://www.govinfo.gov/content/pkg/FR-2025-04-04/html/2025-05795.htm
item.category: Federal Aviation Administration, U.S. Department of Transportation.

item.title: Request for Comment To Withhold Certain Aircraft Registration Information From Public Dissemination
item.description:
The Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) is soliciting comments about the implications of eliminating select aircraft registration data from public display on FAA websites, including current search functions and published reports. This removal aims to satisfy requirements from the FAA Reauthorization Act of 2024 for the exclusion of Personally Identifiable Information (PII) of private aircraft owners/operators from broad dissemination. COMMENTS_DUE: 05 MAY 2025

More info at: https://www.govinfo.gov/content/pkg/FR-2025-04-03/html/2025-05738.htm
item.category: Federal Aviation Administration (FAA), Department of Transportation (DOT).

item.title: Notice of Early Public and Governmental Engagement for Potential Designation of Tribal Energy Access, Southwestern Grid Connector, and Lake Erie-Canada National Interest Electric Transmission Corridors; Reopening of Comment Period
item.description:
The Grid Deployment Office of the Department of Energy is seeking comments, input, and data on their potential designation of three National Interest Electric Transmission Corridors. Comments are invited on the potential environmental, cultural, and socioeconomic effects of the designations and on DOE’s engagement framework. COMMENTS_DUE: 15 APR 2025

More info at: https://www.govinfo.gov/content/pkg/FR-2025-04-03/html/2025-05698.htm
item.category: Grid Deployment Office, Department of Energy.

item.title: Proposed Agency Information Collection Activities; Comment Request
item.description:
The Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System is welcoming comments on a proposal to maintain, without amendments, the investment notification in bank premises for a period of three years (FR 4014; OMB No. 7100-0139). COMMENTS_DUE: 02 JUN 2025

More info at: https://www.govinfo.gov/content/pkg/FR-2025-04-02/html/2025-05644.htm
item.category: Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System.

item.title: Proposed Agency Information Collection Activities; Comment Request
item.description:
The Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System is seeking comments on extending the Recordkeeping and Disclosure Requirements for Regulation H (Loans Secured by Real Estate in Flood Hazard Areas) for three more years without revision. COMMENTS_DUE: 02 JUN 2025

More info at: https://www.govinfo.gov/content/pkg/FR-2025-04-02/html/2025-05647.htm
item.category: Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System.

item.title: Draft Environmental Assessment, Public Hearing, and Request for Comment on the Draft Environmental Assessment, Maximum Economic Recovery, and Fair Market Value for the Freedom Mine Company Proposed Emergency Federal Coal Lease-by-Application and Mining Plan Modification for NDM 111186 and Mining Plan Modification for NDM 091535, Mercer County, ND
item.description:
The Bureau of Land Management (BLM) and the Office of Surface Mining Reclamation and Enforcement (OSMRE) are seeking public comments on a draft Environmental Assessment (EA) of the Freedom Mine Company's proposed Emergency Federal Coal Lease-by-Application and Mining Plan Modification for NDM 111186 and NDM 091535 in Mercer County, North Dakota. COMMENTS_DUE: 02 MAY 2025

More info at: https://www.govinfo.gov/content/pkg/FR-2025-04-02/html/2025-05671.htm
item.category: Bureau of Land Management, Interior.

item.title: Agency Information Collection Activities; Submission to the Office of Management and Budget for Review and Approval; Bureau of Reclamation Use Authorization Application
item.description:
The Bureau of Reclamation is seeking comments on a proposed renewal of an information collection related to use authorization applications for Reclamation's lands, facilities, or water bodies. This is necessary for the proper performance of the agency's functions and includes considerations like practical utility, methodology accuracy, ways to enhance quality, clarity, and response burden minimization. COMMENTS_DUE: 02 MAY 2025

More info at: https://www.govinfo.gov/content/pkg/FR-2025-04-02/html/2025-05571.htm
item.category: Bureau of Reclamation, Interior.

item.title: Proposed Extension of Information Collection; Employers' Claim for Reimbursement Assisted Reemployment (AR) Program
item.description:
The Department of Labor is requesting public comments on the proposed extension of information collection for the Employers' Claim for Reimbursement Assisted Reemployment (AR) Program, aiming to reduce paperwork and respondent burden. COMMENTS_DUE: 02 JUN 2025

More info at: https://www.govinfo.gov/content/pkg/FR-2025-04-02/html/2025-05583.htm
item.category: Office of Workers' Compensation Programs, Labor.

item.title: State of Connecticut: NRC Staff Assessment of a Proposed Agreement Between the Nuclear Regulatory Commission and the State of Connecticut
item.description:
The U.S. Nuclear Regulatory Commission (NRC) is requesting public comments on a proposed agreement with the State of Connecticut and a draft assessment by NRC staff of Connecticut's regulatory program for radioactive materials. This agreement, under the Atomic Energy Act of 1954, would see NRC discontinuing and the state assuming regulatory authority over certain types of radioactive materials. Comments can be on the proposed agreement's possible effect on public health and safety, the draft staff assessment, the adequacy of Connecticut's program or its staffing. COMMENTS_DUE: 18 Apr 2025

More info at: https://www.govinfo.gov/content/pkg/FR-2025-04-02/html/2025-05139.htm
item.category: Nuclear Regulatory Commission.

item.title: Agency Information Collection Activities; Notice and Request for Comment; National Survey of the Use of Booster Seats
item.description:
The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration (NHTSA) is seeking public comments on the intention to request approval from the Office of Management and Budget (OMB) for an extension of a currently-approved collection of information. This pertains to the National Survey of the Use of Booster Seats (NSUBS), a biennial collection examining the use of child restraint systems in vehicles. COMMENTS_DUE: 02 JUN 2025

More info at: https://www.govinfo.gov/content/pkg/FR-2025-04-02/html/2025-05666.htm
item.category: National Highway Traffic Safety Administration (NHTSA), U.S. Department of Transportation (DOT).

item.title: Comments in Aid of Analyses of the Terrorism Risk Insurance Program
item.description:
The U.S. Department of the Treasury is seeking public comments on the analysis of the Terrorism Risk Insurance Program, specifically regarding the participation of small insurers. The department seeks information on the challenges these insurers face in the terrorism risk insurance marketplace. COMMENTS_DUE: 19 May 2025

More info at: https://www.govinfo.gov/content/pkg/FR-2025-04-02/html/2025-05580.htm
item.category: Departmental Offices, U.S. Department of the Treasury.

item.title: Agency Information Collection Activities; Submission to the Office of Management and Budget (OMB) for Review and Approval; Comment Request; EEO Initial Informal Complaint Contact Sheet Common Form
item.description:
The Department of Commerce requests public and federal agency comment on the proposed and continuing information collections for the new EEO Initial Informal Complaint Contact Sheet Common Form. The form will record the personal information, bases, and allegations raised by individuals who file complaints of discrimination based on attributes such as race, sex, age, etc. COMMENTS_DUE: 30 MAY 2025

More info at: https://www.govinfo.gov/content/pkg/FR-2025-03-31/html/2025-05459.htm
item.category: Census Bureau, Department of Commerce.

item.title: Agency Information Collection Activities; Submission to the Office of Management and Budget (OMB) for Review and Approval; Comment Request; Foreign National Request Form
item.description:
The Department of Commerce is requesting public comments on proposed information collections about foreign national access to its facilities and resources for risk mitigation. The aim is to standardize requirements and expand current guidance to manage emerging risks. COMMENTS_DUE: 30 MAY 2025

More info at: https://www.govinfo.gov/content/pkg/FR-2025-03-31/html/2025-05496.htm
item.category: Office of Security, Insider Risk and Continuity, Office of the Secretary, Commerce.

item.title: Agency Information Collection Activities; Submission to the Office of Management and Budget (OMB) for Review and Approval; Comment Request; Foreign-Trade Zones Applications
item.description:
The Department of Commerce is seeking comments on the Paperwork Reduction Act regarding foreign trade zones applications. The applications are the way firms apply for foreign trade zone status, production authority, modifications of existing zones, or waivers. COMMENTS_DUE: 30 May 2025

More info at: https://www.govinfo.gov/content/pkg/FR-2025-03-31/html/2025-05462.htm
item.category: International Trade Administration, Commerce.

item.title: Agency Information Collection Activities; Submission to the Office of Management and Budget (OMB) for Review and Approval; Comment Request; Using Quick Response Surveys To Understand Public Perception and Response
item.description:
The Department of Commerce’s National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration is seeking comments on its proposal to use Quick Response Surveys to understand better how the public perceives and responds to warnings and forecasts of high impact weather events. The collected information will help improve the way hazardous weather risks are communicated to the public. COMMENTS_DUE: 30 May 2025

More info at: https://www.govinfo.gov/content/pkg/FR-2025-03-31/html/2025-05488.htm
item.category: National Oceanic & Atmospheric Administration (NOAA), Commerce.

item.title: Agency Information Collection Activities; Submission to the Office of Management and Budget (OMB) for Review and Approval; Comment Request; Pacific Islands Protected Species Workshop Participant Registration Form
item.description:
The Department of Commerce is seeking public comments on the information collection related to the Pacific Islands Protected Species Workshop Participant Registration Form. Specific focus is on the necessity, accuracy, clarity, and methods of data collection from owners and operators of longline fishing vessels under NOAA's certification program. COMMENTS_DUE: 30 MAY 2025

More info at: https://www.govinfo.gov/content/pkg/FR-2025-03-31/html/2025-05484.htm
item.category: National Oceanic & Atmospheric Administration (NOAA), Commerce.

item.title: Agency Information Collection Activities; Submission to the Office of Management and Budget (OMB) for Review and Approval; Comment Request; Applications and Reporting Requirements for the Incidental Take of Marine Mammals by Specified Activities (Other Than Commercial Fishing Operations) Under the Marine Mammal Protection Act
item.description:
The Department of Commerce is seeking public comment on proposed and continuing information collections relating to applications and reporting requirements for the incidental take of marine mammals by specified activities (other than commercial fishing) under the Marine Mammal Protection Act. COMMENTS_DUE: 30 MAY 2025

More info at: https://www.govinfo.gov/content/pkg/FR-2025-03-31/html/2025-05487.htm
item.category: National Oceanic & Atmospheric Administration (NOAA), Commerce.

item.title: Agency Information Collection Activities; Submission to the Office of Management and Budget (OMB) for Review and Approval; Comment Request; Capital Construction Fund Agreement, Certificate Family of Forms and Deposit/Withdrawal Report
item.description:
The Department of Commerce is inviting public feedback on its continuing information collections related to the Capital Construction Fund Agreement, Certificate Family of Forms, and Deposit/Withdrawal Report. The comments will help assess the impact of these requirements and minimize public reporting burden. COMMENTS_DUE: 30 MAY 2025

More info at: https://www.govinfo.gov/content/pkg/FR-2025-03-31/html/2025-05486.htm
item.category: National Oceanic & Atmospheric Administration (NOAA), Commerce.

item.title: Agency Information Collection Activities; Submission to the Office of Management and Budget (OMB) for Review and Approval; Comment Request; West Coast Region Groundfish Trawl Logbook
item.description:
The Department of Commerce is inviting comments on the proposed and ongoing information collections related to the West Coast Region Groundfish Trawl Logbook. The data include set-level effort including time, location, and estimated pounds of fish caught per set. COMMENTS_DUE: 30 MAY 2025

More info at: https://www.govinfo.gov/content/pkg/FR-2025-03-31/html/2025-05485.htm
item.category: National Oceanic & Atmospheric Administration (NOAA), Commerce.

item.title: Petition of EnCap Investments L.P., et al., To Reopen and Modify Order
item.description:
EnCap Investments L.P. and other entities have requested the Federal Trade Commission (FTC) to reconsider and modify an order dated September 13, 2022, to remove certain prior approval requirements. This petition does not intend to affect its legal status or its final disposition. COMMENTS_DUE: 30 April 2025

More info at: https://www.govinfo.gov/content/pkg/FR-2025-03-31/html/2025-05498.htm
item.category: Federal Trade Commission.

item.title: Information Collection: Tribal Participation in the Advance Notification Program
item.description:
The U.S. Nuclear Regulatory Commission (NRC) seeks comments on the renewal of an existing information collection request titled "Tribal Participation in the Advance Notification Program." This program gathers information from federally recognized Indian Tribes to notify them about certain shipments of radioactive material across their reservations. COMMENTS_DUE: 30 APR 2025

More info at: https://www.govinfo.gov/content/pkg/FR-2025-03-31/html/2025-05468.htm
item.category: Nuclear Regulatory Commission.

item.title: Agency Information Collection Activities: Information Collection Renewal; Comment Request; Leasing
item.description:
The Office of the Comptroller of the Currency (OCC) is seeking comments on the renewal of its information collection relating to leasing, as required by the Paperwork Reduction Act of 1995. The OCC aims to reduce respondent burden and paperwork. COMMENTS_DUE: 30 MAY 2025

More info at: https://www.govinfo.gov/content/pkg/FR-2025-03-31/html/2025-05497.htm
item.category: Office of the Comptroller of the Currency (OCC), Treasury.

item.title: Information Collection; Timber Sale Contract Operations and Administration
item.description:
The Forest Service is soliciting comments regarding the extension and revision of currently approved information collection 0596-0225, Timber Sale Contract Operations and Administration, in accordance with the Paperwork Reduction Act of 1995. COMMENTS_DUE: 27 May 2025

More info at: https://www.govinfo.gov/content/pkg/FR-2025-03-28/html/2025-05413.htm
item.category: Forest Service, Agriculture (USDA).

item.title: Information Collection Activities; Comment Request
item.description:
The Department of Labor and Bureau of Labor Statistics are seeking public feedback on the extension of the "American Time Use Survey", which collects ongoing data to provide nationally representative estimates of how people in the U.S. allocate their time across various activities. COMMENTS_DUE: 27 MAY 2025

More info at: https://www.govinfo.gov/content/pkg/FR-2025-03-28/html/2025-05325.htm
item.category: Bureau of Labor Statistics, Department of Labor.

item.title: Agency Information Collection Activities; Notice and Request for Comment; 23 CFR Part 1327 Procedures for Participating in and Receiving Information From the National Driver Register
item.description:
The Department of Transportation (DOT) is seeking public comments on its intention to request approval from the Office of Management and Budget (OMB) for an extension of a currently approved information collection titled "National Driver Register (NDR)." The NDR assists State driver licensing officials in sharing information about motor vehicle driving records of individuals. The DOT seeks feedback on the necessity, quality, and clarity of the information collected. COMMENTS_DUE: 27 May 2025

More info at: https://www.govinfo.gov/content/pkg/FR-2025-03-28/html/2025-05342.htm
item.category: National Highway Traffic Safety Administration (NHTSA), Department of Transportation (DOT).

item.description:
The Senate is addressing concerns regarding potential changes to the Social Security Program. Specifically, the proposed privatization of the program and alleged false claims being disseminated about it. Senators are sharing constituent worries about continuous income stability, accessibility to services, and general future uncertainty. COMMENTS_DUE: 30 APR 2025

More info at: https://www.govinfo.gov/content/pkg/CREC-2025-03-31/html/CREC-2025-03-31-pt2-PgS1961.htm
